storyInfo: Ela has only just arrived in Kazimierz when she immediately runs into a series of deplorable incidents. Thus forcing her to strike back at the instigators.

attributes.content: 'We will be connecting with three other nomadic cities. This will be the prelude to the Kazimierz Major...'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Looks like I picked a bad time to come here.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The ground is damp, as though rain had just fallen.

Ela looks up at the darkened sky, but she could not tell whether the sun was being blocked by dark clouds that had yet to disperse, the towering skyscrapers, or the bright advertising boards on the walls that are lit bright like it was midnight.
'Even outside tournament season, our abundant sightseeing and shopping attractions will make your trip more than worth your while.' Let me see...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Visit 'Słoma Food Company HQ'... 'Słomaland'... 'Słoma Prime Mall'... 'Słoma Night Expo'...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: And two 15% off Słoma coupons.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is there no other place that I can go?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is that it?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You should have taken one brochure each from Słoma, Mieszko and Rose Paper Union at the entrance, Miss Ela.
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: And who might you be?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You were previously employed at Dossoles by Reynell Kowalski, whose whereabouts are presently unknown. Where is he now?
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: I haven't seen him since I left Dossoles.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Nevertheless, we would much appreciate your assistance. He left behind a considerable amount of assets in Kazimierz when he disappeared irresponsibly.
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: As someone who has had dealings with him in Dossoles, your statement will help our cause in the division of his assets... and yours.
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: You mean I'll get a bunch of cash.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: We will compensate you, commensurate with—
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: Looks like I really came at a bad time.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let me make this clear. I haven't seen him and his fox ears since I left Dossoles. I don't want anything to do with his 'business' or 'assets.'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela walks away from the man dressed in black and gets on a taxi by the roadside.
In her hurry, she drops the Słoma tourism brochure in a puddle on the ground, dyeing the puddle a bright shade of pink.
...Why did you come to Kazimierz, then, if you didn't want to get involved?
attributes.name: Unremarkable Man

attributes.content: Good thing the hotel's not far from the city gates...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: ...They're still following.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is that a quiet alley up ahead? Just what I needed.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Can't call it a coincidence anymore.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Whisper) First time the modified GRZMOT Mine sees action. No need to thank me.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Come quietly and you won't have to get hurt.
attributes.name: Stalker

attributes.content: Y-You there! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Trembling Voice

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Stalker

attributes.content: Tsk!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Man in Reporter Garb

attributes.content: You awake?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I didn't think you would be able to deal with that guy on your own... where did he go?
attributes.name: Man in Reporter Garb

attributes.content: Ran away. Couldn't go after him with you on the ground like that. What's your name?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Rafał. I'm a reporter. What about you?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Ela.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I've heard that name before... you were Reynell's bodyguard in Dossoles, weren't you?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Guy's more famous than I thought.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Reynell Kowalski always makes great headlines, after all.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Rafał takes out a cigarette and tugs it behind his ear.
Can I ask you a few questions? Before the incident—
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Enough questions. Are you able to make it home?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Sorry, I'll be going.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Time to drop by the Rhodes Island office. Here's hoping nothing weird happens from this point on.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Make a right there.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I said, make a right—
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Sorry, I was listening to the tournament results. I made a killing on this one. I'll turn the next corner.
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: I thought there were no majors going on right now.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Small tournaments happen all the time. There's an arena quite close to here. Would you like to take a look?
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Not interested.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Come on, let's go, everyone who comes here goes there—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Take me to the destination that I asked for. There, you missed another turn.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Don't apologize. Just slow down; the next turn is coming up.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I said, slow down—
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela tries to open the door, but it is locked tight, and the driver continues to look absent-minded.
Suddenly, she is reminded of Reynell, who landed safely in a pool after jumping from a great height.
This is Kazimierz, not Poland. She is an outsider. Who knows what Originium Arts can do in the hands of these people?
She glances at the driver's right foot, and takes out a gun.
No sudden moves.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What the—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Ela reaches out with her foot and stomps on the idle pedal.
The wheels lock and skid, but manage to stop before the intersection.
A large truck rumbles through the intersection that the taxi would have driven through.
Now, I want an explanation—
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Hey, where did he go?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Just a driver who got carried away after winning a few coins. He wouldn't have gotten away if anything happened to you.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: I have reasons to believe he used Originium Arts or some device to escape. I drove the car over. It's right there. You can examine it.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Really? Where is it?
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Right there, in the parking lot—
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It's gone?!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Lady, I understand you may have been feeling emotional, but you can't just go around accusing people without proof.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: I saw it with my own eyes, officer! That truck passed right in front of the nose of the taxi that she was in and almost hit it!
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: And who are you?
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: A reporter passing by! There was someone stalking this Miss Ela over here, forcing her to use force—
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Get out.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: This is going in the papers, I tell you!
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: You write whatever you want. Now, get out!
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: So you were stalking me too?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I—alright, I'm sorry. You were Reynell's bodyguard, after all. I thought you might have something to offer.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: And you were hoping I would be thankful for your 'help' when you saw the car accident?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Wait, Miss Ela. First the stalker, then the accident. Don't you find it suspicious?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I don't need you to tell me.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I have an idea who the culprit is!
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Reynell's uncle, Bogdan Kowalski.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: He had been demanding his share of Szczepan's inheritance. With Reynell missing, he probably believed you were here to handle the assets for Reynell, and decided to dispose of you.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Dispose of? Is Kazimierz a place where you can kill people on a whim?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Of course not, but the rich and powerful can always find someone to do their dirty work.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Thank you for the heads-up. It might be helpful.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Quite the contrary. I'm not changing my schedule just because of this. Besides, those who treat human lives so callously need to be taught a lesson.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Keep looking for clues. There's bound to be something.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: There's one right here. Abetting murder.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: That's not enough.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It's enough when you have a reporter... I'll be straight with you. Do you want to work with me and teach that old man a lesson?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Did you also work as Reynell's bodyguard?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm serious. I have a score or two to settle with old Bogdan.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I was once the chief editor of a newspaper agency under the Rose Paper Union banner. Bogdan hosted an art exhibit five years ago, and it was a complete mess, yet all the media did was lick his boots.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I felt someone had to speak the truth, show the public how bad the exhibit was, so I wrote a column criticizing it overnight...
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: And it never made it to the printing press?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It did. It was well-received, and sales of the paper shot up. I thought I was going to get a raise. Here, I kept a copy.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: You certainly didn't mince words.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: A month later, I learned that Bogdan had been pressuring the agency to fire me, but the company president stepped in and kept me around as a reporter in the field, where I've been keeping a low profile.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Ela sizes the reporter up as he folds up the yellowish newspaper and tucks it away.
What are you planning?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Simple. Find concrete evidence that the accident was a murder attempt and seize the initiative.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: (Whisper) Bogdan often talks business here. We might learn something if we eavesdrop.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: (Whisper) Shh, I hear a car.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I know that guy, and I know that car...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'll pick the lock once the driver has gotten off. Keep watch for me.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I'll—
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let me do it. I know Kazimierz cars better.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Hey, what's this?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Everything in this alley has been turned upside down. There's no point—
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What's this?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: A check... with Kowalski's signature?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Looks like we got lucky.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: O-Of course.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I wonder how long it will last.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Well... hehe...
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Did you see the one who tried to recruit you when you first arrived?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I'm checking...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Huh? What?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Dad, I lost again.
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I told you not to bet on the tourneys... hey, where did you get the money?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Lear lent me some.
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I'm busy, and I don't have any money.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: But you said you were going to—
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: There, he's wearing a suit like yours.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I see him.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Your daughter?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Heh... yeah. She bets on the tourneys every day. If she doesn't get money from me, she tries to borrow it from somewhere else.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Anyway, enough chit-chat. We're the stalkers this time.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Here's what we have so far...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: A photo of an unidentified device, a check found in an alley, and a photo of the man who spoke to me entering Kowalski manor.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm not sure how these constitute any sort of his 'weakness.'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: If that's enough to convict Bogdan, I'll have even less faith in the judicial system of Kazimierz than I do in their law enforcement.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: A draft doesn't necessarily have to be sent out. The same goes for evidence.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Don't you understand?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I'm understanding less and less by the minute.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: We'll send him evidence of him hiring killers as a warning, as well as demand compensation.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: You can use that money to visit the other cities. The cities of the Kawalerielki Alliance are all the same; if you've seen one, you've seen them all.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Me? I'll take the money and ply my trade somewhere else, maybe go home and start a news agency. I want to put the Rose Paper Union out of business in my hometown.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: You still want to be a reporter?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why do you think I became one in the first place? Why else would I pick a fight with Bogdan?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Isn't that blackmail?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: So what? He actually tried to kill you.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Why stop there, then? Why not bring Kowalski down entirely?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What the heck are you talking about?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: You wanted to ask me about Reynell, didn't you? Well, I heard a thing or two about Reynell's parents from a gentleman by the name of Miłosz while I was in Dossoles.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Miłosz... Reynell's secretary?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Rafał's eyes light up, but the spark is soon covered up by his thick lenses.
See, you're interested.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I... I don't think those two have anything that can deal a real blow to Bagodan, not even if it's from that Miłosz's mouth.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Szczepan and Alizja were a loving couple. Not much of a story there.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Miłosz had a different story.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Rafał's lenses could no longer hide the spark in his eyes. He takes out a pen, then tucks another cigarette behind his ear.
I don't smoke, but this helps me think when I'm working.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Do you know about the damaged statue that was sold for an astronomical price shortly before Alizja passed away? According to Miłosz, there was in fact no deep meaning behind it, as Szczepan had boasted of.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela narrated the story as told to her by Miłosz, avoiding subjective sentiments as much as possible.
Before phrases like 'verbal assault' and 'economic control', however, 'loving couple' seems like a bad joke.
Good heavens... what about Reynell? He always looked like he respected his father greatly!
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: There is only a twisted hatred for his hypocritical father. Why else would he have blown up his own Galería Krysztauowa?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He blew it up? That's totally different from the story that's out there! Please, I really must know more! I'll pay—
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Where's the money from? The blackmail? Or the money that Bogdan already paid you?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Obviously—
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: (Eyes wide open)
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Miss Ela, this is no time for jokes! I'm not—
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Drop the act, Mr. Rafał.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Everything that has happened up to this point, the chance encounter, the shadowing, evidence that just dropped from the sky... they're suspicious, but it wasn't out of the question that they could have been a coincidence.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You want to blackmail Bogdan Kowalski.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: A few words from him were enough to ruin your career, and yet you wanted me to blackmail him, in a place where both the police and the courts could be bought.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Don't lie to me. I'm not Kazimierzian. You are.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why attempt something that's almost destined to fail?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Because you wanted me to come under suspicion of blackmail, and get the police and the courts on Bogdan's side.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I didn't have a choice... you heard the phone call... I needed money...
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Why should I believe you?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Heavy breathing) I swear, I may have sold my dignity to Bogdan, but every word I said about my career was true.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: And the newspaper? You didn't throw it away as soon as the curtains closed, did you?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: After a moment of silence, Rafał takes out the yellowish newspaper cutting, folded as neatly as the last time Ela saw it.
I never threw it away.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Then it's your turn to fight back.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Fight back? The story about Szczepan and Alizja is a good one, but what does it have to do with Bogdan?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: If Alizja's statue was made under coercion, violence and lies, what about the other artworks that Bogdan has?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: *Kazimierzian profanity*!
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Let me make this clear: This will shake the very foundation of the art market of Kazimierz. Reynell wanted to do it. It was a roundabout method that almost killed a bunch of people, but in the end, he failed.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why didn't he let the world know? I doubt it's to protect the father he hated.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I know, Miss Ela. I know. Kazimierz won't allow it.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: He takes out a lighter, hand fumbling as he fetches the cigarette from behind his ear, lights it, and takes it in deeply. His face is deathly pale.
I thought I could keep it there. Sorry. But I must say, Miss Ela...
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I may not be the first reporter in Kazimierz to know about it, maybe not even the first who's tried to bring it to light...
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: But I stand on the same side of the curtain as the shocking truth. Maybe hundreds of people have stood here before, and no one even found their bodies...
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Chrzanić to! I'm tearing this curtain in half!
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Bogdan Kowalski foolishly threatened your life and safety. You acted reasonably in self-defense.
attributes.name: Humble Secretary

attributes.content: Plus, Rhodes Island is an important guest of Kazimierz... the Chamber has nothing to say about Bogdan. What he wants will never belong to him.
attributes.name: Humble Secretary

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Now, I ask that you honor our gentleman's agreement.
attributes.name: Humble Secretary

attributes.content: Could I go back on it even if I wanted to?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You people had everyone concerned in custody two hours before the feature on the Kowalski family hit the press, and made the paper come up with a replacement article within the hour.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I learned a lot from Kazimierz today.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: As we did from you. Less than a month into your visit to Kazimierz, you stirred up a storm that almost destroyed an entire industry.
attributes.name: Humble Secretary

attributes.content: (Shrugs) One last request. Can I see Rafał? Where is he?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He is doing well. We can approve your request for a visit if you insist, but we will require further... conditions in our agreement.
attributes.name: Humble Secretary

attributes.content: Ela. You doing ok?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: I've been given preferential treatment thanks to some unexpected ties... is this the new job that the General Chamber of Commerce got you? What do you do now?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Rafał's lip twitches as he glances at his collar, where there seems to be a metallic glint of sorts. He lights a cigarette for himself.
I'm, *cough*, reviewing newspapers prior to publication.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Sorry, I always prefer to have it behind my ear, but I needed something to calm my nerves.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Is it such a bad thing to get a first-hand look at the process and standards?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Terrible. Look at what I have to review every day.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: 'The Red Wine'?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: A good paper, isn't it?
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Looks like whoever made this decision had a twisted sense of humor.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let's talk about something else. How's your daughter? Is your new income enough to support her gambling?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Wry smile) Enough to get the best seats. She's one of their best customers now.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: ...It really does sound terrible.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It is, but everything is getting better.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: And what does that mean?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It means Kazimierz never changes. I'm the only one who does.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: They're willing to pay me a lot of money. All I need to do is... behave.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Rafał inhales deeply and gazes at the ceiling. This time, Ela can see the microphone underneath his collar clearly.
You see that? High-tech stuff, here to help me behave, just like the salary that I wouldn't even have dreamed of just a few days ago.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Not a gadget I dare to get rid of. As for the other... soon, I wouldn't want to be rid of it.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Dreams and willpower can be worn down. When it's all said and done, everything will get better, and I'll be a model Kazimierz citizen, just like my daughter.
attributes.name: Rafał

attributes.content: Rafał puts the cigarette out and goes back to his place in a long row of office seats.
Ela scans the room. All of them seem to be doing the same work as Rafał. Some look frustrated, some look numb, and some look around uneasily...
How many of them have said, 'chrzanić to'? Maybe it was just Rafał, who is now winking at her, or maybe it was all of them.
Ela gives Rafał an encouraging gaze, and glances down at the issue of The Red Wine in her hand.

attributes.name: Ela
attributes.content: Zofia

attributes.name: Ela
attributes.content: Zofia?!
'Whislash' Zofia. Now that's an exciting coincidence.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Excuse me, am I speaking to Miss Ela?
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm the manager of the Gale Knightclub. We would like to inquire into your interest in participating in knight tournaments...
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: What's next? You want me to pay a registration fee?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Perhaps you misunderstood—oh, you want to talk to our patron yourself? Alright, here you go...
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Miss Ela, I'm the main sponsor of the Gale Knightclub, and a business rival of Bogdan Kowalski.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: We would like to congratulate you on your good fortune, and we could not help but notice your outstanding skills and judgment in the face of danger—
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Maybe we would have gotten along better if you just said you were shadowing me.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It's the tournaments this time, isn't it?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: The knight tournaments of the country of knights... round one was a draw, Kazimierz. Let's see about round two.
attributes.name: Ela
